content:
1. EGfacitityy (Unit: MWh)

VB Assessment Data / Parameter EGfacility,y Data unit MWh/yr Description Quantity of net electricity generation supplied by the project plant/unit to the grid in year y The monitoring parameter, Unit, and descriptions are as per the registered VCS-PD /05/. Source of data Electricity meter(s) The monitoring parameter is measured by energy meters installed at power house and at the delivery point at 225kV substation. One meter per group has been installed in the power house as well as at the delivery substation, totalling 8 devices. The metering arrangement is verified during the remote interview/physical site visit and single line diagram /14/. in the The source of data is accordance with registered VCS-PD /05/. Description of measurement methods and procedures to be applied This parameter should be calculated as difference between (a) the quantity of electricity supplied by the project plant/unit to the grid, and (b) the quantity of electricity delivered to the project plant/unit from the grid. In case it is calculated then the following The monitoring parameter is measured by energy meters installed at power house and at the delivery point at 225kV substation.
